params._inputBox: The input box used by the portal

params._execLayerData: Additional data to be interpreted by the execution layer

depositERC20Tokens(address,address,uint2.notice: Transfer ERC-20 tokens to a DApp and add an input to the DApp's input box to signal such operation. The caller must allow the portal to withdraw at least `_amount` tokens from their account beforehand, by calling the `approve` function in the token contract.

getInputBox().notice: Get the input box used by this portal.

userdoc.notice: This contract allows anyone to perform transfers of ERC-20 tokens to a DApp while informing the off-chain machine.
